actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 12:00 p.m. on September 12, 2023.

The House received a communication from Eric A. "Rick" Crawford, Member of Congress. Pursuant to Rule VIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives, Mr. Crawford notified the House that he had been served with a subpoena for documents and testimony issued by the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York and that after consultation with the Office of General Counsel, he had determined that compliance with the subpoena is partially consistent with the privileges and rights of the House.

The House received a message from the Acting Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Acting Clerk received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on September 7, 2023, at 3:20 p.m.: Appointment: Senate National Security Working Group for the 118th Congress.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Reverend Daniel Carson, St. Peters Catholic Church, Washington, D.C.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Andy Harris to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
